description: Richard Powell gave false details to authorities after flying to the Isle of Man in a private plane.
title: Coronavirus Isle of Man: Man who tried to avoid new laws remanded in custody
title_page: Coronavirus Isle of Man: Man who tried to avoid new laws remanded in custody - BBC News
maintext: He was arrested by police at a holiday cottage in Union Mills, in the east of the island, where he had been self-isolating away from his family, who were already on the Isle of Man.
